Understate: The claim may understate the severity of the issue by suggesting that juveniles arrested for car theft are always sent home immediately, when in reality, it is not automatic and depends on various factors.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or data to support the assertion that juveniles arrested for car theft in Milwaukee County are always sent home immediately.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the point system in juvenile court is the sole determining factor for whether or not a juvenile will be held for any period of time, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for why juveniles arrested for car theft in Milwaukee County are sometimes sent home immediately, such as limited resources or overcrowding in detention facilities.
